text.taxExplanationText: CHARGES MAY BE SUBJECTED TO LOCAL TAX

text.title-2: IS ON ITS WAY TO YOU
text.body-1: Champagne is one of the elegant extras in life
text.body-2: I only drink Champagne on two occasions, when I am in love and when I am not.
text.body-3: Too much of anything is bad, but too much Champagne is just right.
text.body-4: Remember gentlemen, it's not just France we are fighting for, it's Champagne!
text.body-5: My only regret in life is that I didn’t drink enough champagne.

text.headline: Changed your mind?
text.body: Bubble not taking your fancy? Ordered a bottle you no longer need? No worries, you can cancel your order.

text.headline: Next, a few settings on your phone
text.pageDescription: We’re nearly nearly there, but we need to set a few pesky permissions on your phone so you can enjoy the full experience on the ship.
text.notificationsDescription: We need these so we can keep you updated about your voyage, booked events and food orders. You can customise what we contact you about in settings.
text.enableLocationDescription: We need this when you are onboard the ship so you can order food and drink, and have it delivered to your location.
text.enableBluetoothDescription: We need this onboard the ship so we can accurately find your location so you can order food and drink, and have it delivered to wherever you are.
text.notificationTitle: ‘Virgin Voyages’ would like to send you notifications
text.locationServiceTitle: Allow ‘Virgin Voyages’ to access your location
text.bluetoothPromptTitle: ‘Virgin Voyages’ would like to use Bluetooth
text.permissionDescriptionS4C: It looks like we don’t have permission to use some of your phone’s functionality. We can’t bring you champagne without these.

text.headline: HEY SAILOR
text.body: You can't access bubbles right now

text.headline: WE'RE SORRY, SAILOR
text.body: Even champagne needs some time to chill (wink). It'll be ready for you soon, so come back and shake again shortly.

text.headline: HEY YOUNG THING
text.body: Looks like you're under 21, which is great because you have your whole life ahead of you. But sadly, you can't shake for champagne until you're in international waters and it's legal.
text.link: GIVE US A SHAKE AGAIN LATER

text.headline: HEY SAILOR
text.body: You're in a location where champagne can't reach you
text.link: GIVE US A SHAKE AGAIN LATER

text.headline: HEY SAILOR
text.body: We can't seem to locate you, try again in a moment or so.
text.link: GIVE US A SHAKE AGAIN LATER

text.headline: HEY SAILOR
text.body: Looks like you don't have enough in your wallet to pop bottles right now. No worries though, you can add more funds any time.
